doc:
Gordon Jones (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gordon_Jones_(actor) 0 Gordon Wynnivo Jones (April 5, 1911 – June 20, 1963) was an American character actor, a member of John Wayne's informal acting company best known for playing Lou Costello's TV nemesis "Mike the Cop" and appearing as The Green Hornet in the first of two movie serials based on that old-time radio program. Gordon_Wynnivo_Jones ( April_5_,_1911 – June_20_,_1963 ) was an_American_character_actor , a_member of John_Wayne 's_informal_acting_company best_known for playing Lou_Costello 's_TV_nemesis " Mike the_Cop " and appearing as The_Green_Hornet in the_first of two_movie_serials based on that_old-time_radio_program .
